description: The photo club puts on a show with Tina and Taeko wearing outfits to draw attention. To this event comes Mayu - a girl who`s been living in England and has returned to go to this college at the age of 16. Seeing Kaoru, her mood improves and she flings herself at him and kisses him on the lips. Mayu convinces Kaoru to spend the night at her house since she`s there alone. Kaoru informs Aoi of this though he neglects to tell Aoi that his friend is a female.
